comments:

adding visibility condition to filter menu if var selected has a null value.

fixed in HEAD

see JavaVarActionFilter

I have verified this fix.  Darin S, please change status to verified or change assignee to CWindatt@ca.ibm.com.

In current builds (I20061214-0010 using version 1.7 of JavaVarActionFilter) the CCE does not occur, instead an empty popup dialog is produced.  It is still better to make the action invisible for null variables.
